subject: Re: [junit] JUnit tests stop working in Eclipse
msgSnippet: ... I overlooked that one when I was trying simple things. I m still interested in why this problem develops, but I m happy to have it solved. Thanks Colin.
messageBody:
----- Original Message ----
> From: Colin Vipurs <zodiaczx6@...>
> Sent: Thu, July 29, 2010 10:59:11 AM
>
> This has happened to me several times - usually just restarting Eclipse
> solves it
>
> On Thu, Jul 29, 2010 at 3:15 PM, glennindevelopment <HOLLIDAY@...>wrote:
> >
> > Symptoms: a project in Eclipse 3.5, with which I have been successfully
> > using a JUnit 4 test suite all along. This morning suddenly when I run a
> > test class with "Run as JUnit Test", Eclipse reports "No JUnit tests found".

I overlooked that one when I was trying simple things.
I'm still interested in why this problem develops,
but I'm happy to have it solved.
Thanks Colin.
 --
Glenn Holliday holliday@...
